import React, { Component } from "react"; import style from "./styles.css"; class Form2 extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { breath: "", martial: "", reaction: "", tight: "", status: "", cancer: "", heart: "", sugar: "", education: "" } } clickChanges = (event) => { console.log(event.target.name === this.state[event.target.id]) if(!event.target.name === this.state[event.target.id]){ return false } else{ return true } } handleChanges = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.id] : event.target.name }) // this.clickChanges(event) } handlePickBox = (event) => { let id = event.target.id let objects = event.target.name let state = this.state console.log(state) if (!state[objects]) { this.setState({ [objects]: true }) } else { this.setState({ [objects]: false }) console.log(state) } } render(){ return( <>

Section 2

  1. Can you hold your breath underwater longer than 1 minute ?

  2. What is your marital status?

  3. When you are in a stressful or difficult situation, how do you most frequently react?

  4. Are you claustrophobic?

  5. Does your family have a history of ... (check all that apply):

  6. Do you have any... (check all that apply):

  7. Check all educational credentials you have received:

    • High school diploma or GED equivalent
    • Associate's Degree
    • Bachelor's Degree
    • Master's Degree
    • PhD

  8. Why do you want to go to Mars?

) } } export default Form2;
